thread.title: Leicester in ‘serious danger’ of being relegated as they lack the togetherness of the ‘Fearless Foxes’ of the last two seasons, says former star Mark Schwarzer

author: hmoore
title: Leicester in ‘serious danger’ of being relegated as they lack the togetherness of the ‘Fearless Foxes’ of the last two seasons, says former star Mark Schwarzer
text:
EFL "people aren't happy" Leicester in ‘serious danger’ of being relegated as they lack the togetherness of the ‘Fearless Foxes’ of the last two seasons, says former star Mark Schwarzer 
Keeper warns his old team-mates they must stop the slide right now... starting at relegation rivals Swansea By Phil Cadden
